name: Final Quest (itch)
description:
Long ago the peaceful world was ravaged by a fierce conflict. King Edward, Sepcom Emperor torn apart by envy and bitter hatred, battled to decide the fate of the world. Ralph and his team are mercanerys true epic warrior's who in the past was quest hunters, look to seek out the magical Gem Power and for those who are trained to use it.

For nearly a decade the Sepcom, Emperor and his followers have held the world under their Leadership , but now its time to fight back, take back what's rightfully there's and bring peace, tranquility and order to the kingdom.

But a time of change is coming. One small boy, the last of a long line of Gem Warrior's, will soon discover his magic, power and leadership and his heritage. In so doing, he will embark upon a Final quest to free the people and to find his long lost father.

Features

  • Updater Tool embedded into the game so that you can download free monthly updates
  • Free Map updates to make the game longer each month
  • Great Story Line
  • Day And Night and the Time matches with your actual time as well as when it gets to 21:00 it starts to get dark in the game.
  • Change in weather in the game too
  • Job Changer
  • Select Your Party
